phrases: But I worked so hard to make them!
It is all the same to me whether you are here or not!
I was in cram school all summer, so I did not have any fun.
I would like to take the entrance exam for Okutsu College of Music Affiliated High School.
I have permission from my father.
it is all about how you ranked in competitions and who your instructor is,
so I might not make the cut.
So my piano teacher said I should look into going overseas.
That she would introduce me to a friend from when she was studying abroad.
Leave the prefecture, leave the country.
Go wherever you want, for all I care!
You moron, it is all the same to me whether you are around or not...
If it is all the same to you whether I am here or not...
So you are the type who cannot hide her uncertainty.
I can read you like a book.
You are covered in scrapes and bruises.
You guys are laughing too hard.
You are going to kill us!
Tsubaki's been acting weird lately, do not you think?
Why do not you leave her alone?
Well, excuse me for my horrible face.
Laughing at me with that nonchalant look on his face!
I was hoping you would praise me.
Talking to you either makes me feel sad, or it sets my mind at ease...
It is just that your feet are huge.
Are you trying to jinx yourself by chanting that kid brother, kid brother curse?
Because you are too scared not to.
I met someone that I like.
See, she is older, the manager of the baseball team.
She is really grounded, and she is got long hair.
She is the kind of person who eats potato chips with chopsticks.
Hey, come on, you know we are too alike.
I mean, we are both infielders, we have got short hair, and we are both rough...
And you always seem so uncomfortable being by my side, Sawabe.
I mean, you are always laughing like you do not know what to do.
We should be with people who are the total opposite, probably.
It is not our style to get all emotional, right?
So let us be ourselves breaking up.
I am the one who is dumping you.
Scoot over, I have got to practice.
I will fall off the bench!
I thought I heard the piano making some strange sounds.
So it was you, after all.
What do you mean, after all?
You are not asking me anything.
If you want to talk about it, I am listening.
He was an older guy that I have always looked up to...
He was like premium ice cream to me.
The kind of ice cream that is not my style.
He told me he liked me...
I am such an idiot, I had no idea about my own feelings.
I wish I would never realized...
Because I wanted things to go on just like this.
I missed my chance to become a star.
I would like to take the entrance exam for Okutsu College of Music Affiliated High School.
Even if they are afraid, even if it is painful,
even if they cannot see ahead, still seeking something...
they take one step after another, mustering the courage to go on...
inspiring each other, supporting each other, they try to move on.
I am the only one who cannot take that first step.
Time does stop, does not it?
I am the only one who is frozen in time...
All you do is play the piano!
Cannot you at least try to comfort me, you useless jerk?
It is all the same to me whether you are around or not!
If it is all the same to you whether I am here or not...
Then I will stay with you.
I will stay by your side.
Being so nice to a girl who just got dumped...
It is not like I am being nice to you.
I am treating you the same as always.
Always by my side whenever I was in pain, whenever I was feeling sad...
The boy who is not my kid brother.
You are the one who is leaving me.
It might be too late now...
But I do not want to give up.
I may be an infielder, and rough, and I may not know anything about the piano,
but I want to be with this person.
I hate music with a passion.
It is always taking Kousei far away from me.
What is that got to do with anything?
I told you, do not be nice to me...
Do not snuggle up against me...
You are certainly training an intriguing girl, Ms. Ochiai.
When young talent collides, they polish each other until they each achieve a sheen.
Do not look back - move forward!
I swear I am going to catch up to you!
You are just going to visit her in the hospital, so what is there to worry about?
I guess I will go see her another time.
All you do is make excuses.
The instant there is a little distance between us, it gets harder to see you.
Even though I did not think twice about seeing you in the music room.
Now I am searching for reasons to see you, and not to see you.
would you mind not getting things to go?
It is not good for Koharu to see!
It is not what you think!
What is getting things to go?
That boy over there brought you home, like takeout, when you fainted.
I am telling you, it is not like that...
But you did get her to go!
What is getting things to go?
I should have introduced myself sooner.
I am a first year in the music course at Kurumigaoka Junior High.
That is a prestigious music school.
What was a pianist doing up in a tree?
I am a huge fan of yours, Ms. Seto!
Mm, you have kind of put me on the spot here...
It would not be right to do that to your own teacher...
Could you convince me with your playing?
The way you carry yourself is first-rate.
Would you like to play Chopin?
The piece Kousei played at the Maihou Competition...
Why is she playing it so harshly?
I would expect no less from Kurumigaoka Junior High...
Are first years today really capable of playing like this?
You sure can play at a high level.
You do not have to cry...
I cannot believe my idol, Ms. Seto, is going to give me lessons...
No black cat or crow around.
I got her a gift, too.
It would be a shame to let it go to waste...
I am her accompanist, so it is only natural that I would go see her.
I am always searching for an excuse.
And so she is totally soaked, from head to toe!
And then Nakamura from Class 2, see,
he is laughing so hard he is got snot dripping from his nose!
And then I burst into laughter, too, so hard that I had a little drip going, too.
What are you thinking, bringing caneles to the daughter of a cake shop owner?
Thank goodness I did not give them to her.
Watari-kun's always coming to see me, so why do not you ever show up?
I never gave you my number
I was just thinking that I had not heard your voice lately.
Hey, you are eating something, are not you?
I wish I could have a canele.
I will bring some to you sometime.
That is a promise, all right?
You are just like a cat.
If I approach you, you turn tail and head off, far away.
When you are hurt, you get all playful, as if you were trying to share your pain.
I feel so much love for you.
I would like to have my dad's caneles.
A canele eaten at night has a slightly bitter, gentle taste.
I thought her face looked familiar.
You are my legs, are not you?
